title: What is a short justification about teaching as a mission and vocation? - Quora

response.answer_text: The joy I see on a student’s face the first moment they master and can produce a figure that had been challenging to them brings me satisfaction like nothing else I’ve known. To have helped someone else to experience the joy of learning is among life’s greatest joys. Helping to foster creative and curious lifelong independent learners is a noble mission.

When you teach as a vocation AND mission, there is an absolute passion that teaching as a vocation alone cannot touch. I can change one life at a time as a cheerleader, life coach, and educator. My passion to impact students beyond just “educating” them makes me love teaching.
You are an expert. The part of being like this is to share your knowledge. It's the only way to continue your movement and not to “die”.
